attributes.action: Mandate Public/Open Domestic Abusers Register ( Butterfly Law)
attributes.additional_details:
As part of a support group & soon to be charity -  Butterfly, filled with fellow female survivors of domestic abuse. We are all at different stages of the legal & healing process, but all have many similarities to our cases. Due to the volumes of  both men & women now suffering at the hands of a partner or ex. 
We would like to see an open/public domestic abuse register as we believe the current legislation in place does not go far enough, or takes too long to facilitate.
attributes.background:
I am a domestic abuse survivor, Myself & many more would like to see an open & public domestic abuse register, similar to those for sex offenders.
One easy to access with factual & up to date information on both male & female offenders of domestic abuse

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Implement an easily accessible public register of convicted domestic abusers" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/742873

You may also be interested in this petition: "New registry of people with 2+ protective orders & automatically notify partners" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/741618
